scripts.install-client: cd frontend && cd history-archives && npm install
scripts.build-client: cd frontend && cd history-archives && npm run build
scripts.start-client: cd frontend && cd history-archives && npm run start-deployed
scripts.install-portal: cd admin && cd admin-portal && npm install
scripts.setup-admin-portal: cd admin && cd admin-portal && pm2 restart admin-portal
scripts.dev-start-frontend: cd frontend && cd history-archives && npm start
